subject: Basketball (College)
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: The matchup was billed as Kentucky’s youngsters against Louisville’s experience, and youth took the upper hand as Aaron Harrison made a go-ahead 3-pointer with 40 seconds remaining.
snippet: The matchup was billed as Kentucky’s youngsters against Louisville’s experience, and youth took the upper hand as Aaron Harrison made a go-ahead 3-pointer with 40 seconds remaining.
